name: Bouncy (Denzel27)
description:
In this side-scroller, you have to try to increase gravity at just the right time and make your ball gain enough speed to jump over the walls! But don't forget to also try to collect some coins to purchase some new styles for your ball.

Controls

Touch and hold the screen to increase gravity (Press and hold the space bar on the desktop version).

  • Touching the screen while the ball is moving downwards will increase the ball's speed and lead to a higher bounce off the ground
  • Touching the screen while the ball is in an upwards motion will slow the ball down and keep it from going too high

To save your progress (highscore, coins), download the Android file below. Unfortunately there is no version available for iOS yet. I am currently collecting donations to pay for the Apple Developer Program though so an iOS version should be up soon.
